tool_description: API to search and filter makeup products by brand, price, category, tags, and other parameters.
title: Makeup API

api_list.name: search_makeup_products
api_list.description: Search makeup products with optional filters such as brand, product type, category, tags, price range, and rating range.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: Brand of the product. Will return all products for each brand.

optional_parameters.name: product_type
optional_parameters.description: The type of makeup being searched for (e.g., lipstick, eyeliner).

optional_parameters.name: product_category
optional_parameters.description: Sub-category for each makeup-type (e.g., lip gloss is a category of lipstick).

optional_parameters.name: product_tags
optional_parameters.description: Tags each product could be tagged with (e.g., vegan). Multiple tags can be separated by commas.

optional_parameters.name: price_greater_than
optional_parameters.description: Will return a list of products with price greater than the indicated number (exclusive).

optional_parameters.name: price_less_than
optional_parameters.description: Will return a list of products with price less than the indicated number (exclusive).

optional_parameters.name: rating_greater_than
optional_parameters.description: Will return a list of products with a rating more than the indicated number (exclusive).

optional_parameters.name: rating_less_than
optional_parameters.description: Will return a list of products with a rating less than the indicated number (exclusive).

api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'http://makeup-api.herokuapp.com/api/v1/products.json'
params = {...}
response = requests.get(url, params=params)
print(response.json())
